title: [Old Noralgar Road]
description: The intersection was apparently once well-traveled, judging from a collective of ruined buildings standing around it.  A derelict inn still maintains a stand against the barrage of prairie grass and elements, with a weathered sign hanging by a single ring above its door.  The castle dominates the horizon to the north, silhouetted against the night sky.

The intersection was apparently once well-traveled, judging from a collective of ruined buildings standing around it.  A derelict inn still maintains a stand against the barrage of prairie grass and elements, with a weathered sign hanging by a single ring above its door.  The castle dominates the horizon to the north, its ramparts surrounded by flocks of crows that circle it like a pestilence of rapacious insects.
paths: Obvious paths: north, southeast, west, northwest
